name: Chakrabarthi Phoenix Dragon, Nirvana Jheva
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Discard a card from hand], choose up to one "Trickstar" and up to one ＜Prayer Dragon＞ unit from your drop, and call them to (RC).[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your rear-guards in the XoverDress state, and [Stand] it.
flavor: While harboring thoughts of the moon, the sun shines upon the new future.

name: Brilliant Equip, Bram Vairina
effect: X-overDress－One "Trickstar" and one ＜Prayer Dragon＞ unit (You may place it by stacking it on all of the specified units instead of calling it to (RC))[CONT](RC):During your turn, if this unit is in the X-overDress state, this unit gets [Power] +10000, and if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Power] +10000. [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, if this unit is in the X-overDress state, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your columns, and retire all of your opponent's units in that column.
flavor: The will to push through thousands of trials. An appearance befitting of it.

name: Jeweled Sword Equip, Garou Vairina
effect: XoverDress－One "Trickstar" and one ＜Prayer Dragon＞ unit (You may place it by stacking it on all of the specified units instead of calling it to (RC))[CONT](RC):If this unit is in the XoverDress state, this unit gets [Power] +10000, and for the battle this unit attacked, when your opponent would call cards from hand to (GC), they must call two or more at the same time. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: The two powers overlap, and from them a single new miracle is born.

name: Diabolos Diver, Julian
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn for each card in your damage zone. If you have a vanguard with "Bruce" in its card name, [Soul-Charge 1] for every two cards in your damage zone. Choose up to the same number of cards [Soul-Charge] by this effect from your soul, and call them to open (RC).
flavor: The scythe of the god of death that rapidly approaches the neck. A split second of offense and defense that decides the outcome.

name: Merciless Count, Botis
effect: [AUTO](RC):When you [Soul-Blast 2] or more at the same time for the cost of your card’s ability, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. If you [Soul-Blast 3] or more at the same time, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a card from your drop, put it into your soul, choose up to one of your opponent's rear-guards with the same grade as that card, and retire it. (Count the number of [Soul-Blast] for one cost)
flavor: It is easy to end the conflict. Just end the lives of all the enemies.

name: Direful Doll, Amandine
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if your soul has ten or more cards, this unit gets [Power] +10000.[ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], and until end of turn, when you would [Soul-Charge] by your card's ability, increase that number by ①.
flavor: Shivering from frenzy or fear -- the hearts of the audience are at her whims.

name: Galactic B-Hero, Unite Dianos
effect: [CONT](VC):All of your front row rear-guards with “B-Hero” in their card names get [Power] +5000. (Active on opponent's turn too)[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, if your Order Zone has a Base, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and until end of that battle, this unit gets [Power] +15000, and if your Order Zone has three or more Bases, this unit gets [Critical]+1.
flavor: You cannot save anything, if all you do is proclaim your justice.

name: Combine Rusher
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a grade 3 or greater unit, if your Order Zone has two or more set orders, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.[AUTO]Drop:When the set order you played from your hand is put into your Order Zone, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and call this card to (RC).
flavor: Victory that lies at the end of a heated battle. Seeking only that, the arms reach out.

name: Galactic B-Hero, Direct Foriel
effect: [AUTO]Back Row Center (RC):At the end of the battle your grade 3 vanguard with “B-Hero” in its card name attacked, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & [Rest] this unit], choose two of your rear-guards in the same column as each other, and swap their positions.
flavor:
As expected, a chance to destroy the enemy!
I'm counting on you to watch my back~!

name: Youthberk "Skyfall Arms"
effect: [RevolDress]－[AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, choose up to one card with "RevolForm" in its card name from your hand, ride it as [Stand], and it gets drive -2 until end of turn.[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Discard a card from hand], look at the top three cards of your deck, choose up to one card with "RevolForm" in its card name from among them and reveal it and put it into your hand, or choose up to one grade 2 or less card from among them and call it to (RC), and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
flavor: The knight disappointed by the heavens, dons its black armor, chooses the destruction of the skies.

name: Youthberk "RevolForm: Gust"
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC) by the [RevolDress] ability, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][discard a card from hand], this unit gets [Power] +10000/drive +1 until end of turn.[AUTO](VC):At the end of your turn, choose a card with the [RevolDress] ability from your soul, and ride it as [Rest].
flavor: The blue lightning speeds forth. Gripping the blade in these hands, leading the path forward.

name: Knight of Fracture, Schneizal
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one grade 3 card with "Youthberk" in its card name from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if your vanguard was placed this turn by riding from a grade 3, choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Nothing can be protected if you do not have the strength. Hence my presence here.

name: Grand March of Full Bloom, Lianorn
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw a card, choose a card from your hand, and call it to (RC) or discard it.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & discard a card from hand], and boost this unit with all of your back row [Stand] units with "Boost". If you boosted this unit with three or more units, this unit gets drive +1 until end of that battle, and at the end of that battle, choose two of your back row rear-guards, and [Stand] them.
flavor: Ten-hut! Ready set! Time to deliver "enjoyment" to the world~♪

name: Performing Petal, Diantha
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a grade 3 or less card from your drop, and call it to (RC).[CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have two or more grade 1 or less rear-guards in your back row, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: The transparent and pure love is brimming in each step.

name: Congratulatory Performance, Sucuse
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts a vanguard, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's grade 2 or greater rear-guard not being attacked, move it to (GC), and if you could not move any units, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Even during the performance, fan service is not omitted.

name: Dragon Deity King of Resurgence, Dragveda
effect: (You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)Additional Effect - Choose one of your vanguards, and [Stand] it!
flavor: As though it is an inextinguishable fire. The fighting will stood without wavering.

name: Hades Dragon Deity of Resentment, Gallmageheld
effect: (You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)Additional Effect - You get "During your turn, all of your vanguards get [Power] +10000/[Critical] +1" until end of this fight!
flavor: Death for all ages to come. That is your unavoidable destiny.

name: Star Dragon Deity of Infinitude, Eldobreath
effect: (You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)Additional Effect - Double the [Power] and [Critical] of all of your front row units until end of turn! (Increase to double its [Power] and [Critical] when activated)
flavor: Hope shines even among the darkness of space, and becomes a bright and shining star.

name: Light Dragon Deity of Honors, Amartinoa
effect: (You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)Additional Effect - Until end of turn, you also perform drive checks for the battles your rear-guards attack!
flavor: Countless heroes are created by the eras, and numerous tales of their glory are etched in history.

name: Source Dragon Deity of Blessings, Blessfavor
effect: (You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)Additional Effect - Draw a card! Choose one of your units, and it gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn! All of your front row units get [Power] +10000! If your damage zone has the same number of cards as your opponent's or more, choose a card from your damage zone, and heal it!
flavor: Changing form, and changing shape. Nature takes on many different faces.

name: Sturdy Wall Equip, Vils Vairina
effect: X-overDress－One "Trickstar" and one ＜Prayer Dragon＞ unit (You may place it by stacking it on all of the specified units instead of calling it to (RC))[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) by X-overDress, choose a card from your drop zone with the X-overDress ability other than "Sturdy Wall Equip, Vils Vairina", and put it into your hand.[CONT](RC)/(GC):If this unit is in the X-overDress state, this unit cannot be chosen by your opponent's card effects, and it gets [Power] +5000/[Shield] +10000. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: Never wavering, no matter what attacks.

name: Sealed Blaze Dragon, Shabda
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have two or more Arms on your (VC), this unit gets [Power] +5000.[AUTO]Drop:When your unit is placed on (RC) from drop, if your vanguard is "Sealed Blaze Maiden, Bavsargra", [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and call this card to (RC).
flavor: Sometimes, the moon watches over the harsh world.

name: Flash Equip Dragon, Bramahda
effect: [AUTO]:When this card becomes an originalDress, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw two cards, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.
flavor: The single strike that aims true, becomes a piercing bolt that shakes up the battle.

name: Term Fracture Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, you may draw a card. If you drew a card, choose a card from your hand, and put it into your soul.
flavor: The view becomes really great, once everything has been flattened.

name: Diabolos Girls, Ivanka
effect: [AUTO](RC):When the attack this unit boosted hits a vanguard, if you are in "Final Rush", [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put the rear-guard this unit boosted on the bottom of deck], draw a card, choose one of your other units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Follow my lead…... And settle it with a bang♪

name: Desire Devil, Kuvisgee
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put into your soul from (RC) by the ability of your "Avaricious Demonic Dragon, Greedon", if you did not [Counter-Charge] this turn, [Counter-Charge 1].[AUTO](Soul):When your rear-guard is placed by a card's ability, if your vanguard is "Avaricious Demonic Dragon, Greedon", and your damage zone has four or more cards, that called unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: I don't mind a shorter lifespan, if that means I can eat my fill!

name: Cardinal Dragon, Nuvorea
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of that battle for each World in your Order Zone. [AUTO]:When this unit is retired from (RC), if your World is Abyssal Dark Night, you may call a Shadow Army token to (RC).
flavor: Melding into the darkness, striking at evil.

name: Aurora Battle Princess, Crumple Orchid
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle your vanguard with "Seraph" in its card name attacked, [COST][Counter-Blast 2], and [Stand] this unit. Your opponent chooses a grade 1 or greater card imprisoned in your Prison, and puts it into their hand.
flavor: Stop resisting or you'll be made to stop!

name: Galactic B-Hero, Rampart Aspida
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is Scouted, [Soul-Charge 1]. (Activates when it is Scouted and put into the Order Zone)[CONT](GC):If your Order Zone has a Base, and you have a vanguard with “B-Hero” in its card name, this unit gets [Shield] +10000.
flavor: Rest assured! I shall protect the lives of you all!

name: Decisive Axe Dragon
effect: [CONT](RC):During the battle that this unit attacks, if your vanguard rode this turn by a card’s effect, your opponent cannot call normal units to (GC) from hand.
flavor: A definite strike, alongside an extraordinary will to fight.

name: Octaray Sorceress
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Sorceress" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at the top two cards from your deck, choose up to two cards from among them, put them into your hand, and put the rest on the top of your deck in any order. If you put two cards into your hand, choose a card from your hand, and put it on the bottom of your deck.[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if you persona rode this turn, this unit gets [Power]+5000 until end of turn.
flavor: The light gathers, as the future rest upon these hands.

name: Enucleate Angel
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your vanguard is placed by riding from a grade 3, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & retire this unit], [Counter-Charge 1], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Remove the bad parts, and swiftly heal up the rest!

name: Ensemble of Smiles, Amalie
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, if you have other grade 1 or less rear-guards, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of that battle. Then, if it boosted a grade 3 or greater vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], and draw a card.
flavor: I want my performance to reach even more people!

name: Battle Siren, Theodosia
effect: [CONT]Back Row (RC):All of your other rear-guards in the same column as this unit cannot be attacked by your opponent's rear-guard.
flavor: While my eyes still have light, you shall not lay even a finger upon my allies!

name: In the Dim Darkness, the Frozen Resentment
effect: Play this with [COST][Soul-Blast 1]! Look at the top three cards of your deck, choose a card from among them, discard it, and shuffle your deck. Choose a card from your drop with grade less than or equal to your vanguard, and call it to (RC).
flavor: Do not walk outside on moonless nights. Your very soul will get stolen otherwise.

name: Sword Equip Dragon, Galondight
effect: [AUTO]:When this card becomes an originalDress, choose one of this card's outerDress units, until end of turn, it gets [Power] +5000, and if the outerDress is "Jeweled Sword Equip, Garou Vairina", it gets [Power] +5000. (An outerDress is the unit that this card is the originalDress of)
flavor: Destruction and protection. Those powers lie within the swords in those two arms.

name: Wall Equip Dragon, Bilskil
effect: [AUTO]:When this card's outerDress is retired from (RC) or (GC) during your opponent's turn, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], and call this card to an open (RC). (An outerDress is the unit that this card is the originalDress of)
flavor: Survive to the very end. Then you will truly be a victor.

name: Sparkle Rejector Dragon
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck)[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.
flavor: Capturing all enmity within the lightning, and reducing it to nothingness with the burning heat.

name: Thoughts That Pierce Through
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from hand]!Choose two cards from your drop with the X-overDress ability, and put them into your hand.
flavor: The same, singular prayer that is repeated every time the eyes close.

name: Explosive Torcher
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if your soul has five or more cards, choose one of your other units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: An alluring shine as though the soul is aflame.

name: Diabolos Madonna, Shena
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, [COST][put one of your other rear-guards into soul], look at the top card of your deck, and call it to (RC) or put it into your soul.
flavor: My play, shall numb you to the very bones!

name: Desire Devil, Phamaan
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, if you do not have other rear-guards, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a "Avaricious Demonic Dragon, Greedon" on your (VC), and it gets [Critical] +1 until end of that battle.
flavor: As I will! My fury shall pierce through!

name: Repelled Malice Dragon
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck)[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.
flavor: Picking up on the slightest malice, and beating it down with its twin wings.

name: Galactic B-Hero, Flatten Sufrey
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's front row rear-guards in the same column as this unit, and retire it.[CONT](RC):During your turn, if your Order Zone has a Base, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: Destructive power! As long as you have that, most things will go well!

name: Aurora Battle Princess, Detain Seekler
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Soul-Blast 3], and your opponent cannot call with your Prison's ability until end of your opponent's next turn.[AUTO]:When this unit is retired from (RC) or (GC), your opponent chooses two of their cards imprisoned in your Prison, and call each of them to (RC) or put into their hand. (They may call both as well. This effect is mandatory)
flavor: Ehh~, isn't it all right♡? Let us take it a bit slower~♡

name: Cardinal Noid, Corofie
effect: [ACT](RC):If your World is Dark Night or Abyssal Dark Night, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit's [Power] increases or decreases to 15000 until end of turn.
flavor: I'll shoot them all down. As long as enemies keep coming.

name: Planet Wall Dragon
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck)[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.
flavor: To destroy the protective wall, firepower sufficient to break a star apart is necessary.

name: Knight of Tempestuousness, Vriede
effect: [CONT](GC):If you have a vanguard with "Youth" in its card name, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: You want to protect here, right? Why not come along with us?

name: Changing Magic, Memeruru
effect: [ACT](RC):If you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Sorceress" in its card name, [COST][retire this unit], choose a [Critical] trigger or [Front] trigger from your drop, and put it into your hand.
flavor: A spin, glitter and some fluffiness. A great transformation of me!

name: Palladium Zeal Dragon
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck)[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.
flavor: Overcoming adversity, to grasp victory.

name: Departure Towards the Dawn
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]!Look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one card with "RevolForm" in its card name from among them and reveal it and put it into your hand, or choose up to one grade 2 or less card from among them and call it to (RC).Shuffle your deck.
flavor: The determination to destroy the skies grows larger, as more like-minded allies gather around the black knight.

name: Spree Wasper
effect: [CONT](RC):During the battle this unit attacked a grade 2 or greater vanguard, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: Show me more, that face twisted in anguish!

name: Marching Debut, Purete
effect: [CONT](RC): During your turn, if you have three or more grade 1 or less rear-guards, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: I'm really nervous…...but if everyone is here…!

name: Custodial Dragon
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck)[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.
flavor: The thirst for life is more steadfast than anything, and inviolable by anyone.

name: Spirits That Roam
effect: Until end of turn, when you would move or swap your rear-guard's position during your main phase, you can also move it within the same row.
flavor: Anywhere should have been within reach, yet that one place continues to elude.

name: Furnacexploder Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of that battle for each of your opponent's open (RC).
flavor: Only one enemy shadow remaining. And all that is left is to pierce through with this spear.

name: Steel Equip Dragon, Bargon
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: If its to blow them away then it’s the perfect job for me!

name: Heat Stamping Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your vanguard attacks, if your opponent has two or less rear-guards, [COST][put this unit into soul], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: All of it, for the sake of confirming their victory. The hearts of the warriors unite as one.

name: Snuggling Blaze Maiden, Reiyu
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Chakrabarthi Phoenix Dragon, Nirvana Jheva", look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to one ＜Prayer Dragon＞ from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.[CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have a ＜Prayer Dragon＞ unit in the same column as this unit, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: If a new future will be hatched, then we shall protect it.

name: Sharp Equip Dragon, Adamaros
effect: [AUTO]:When this card becomes an originalDress, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of this card's outerDress units, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn. (An outerDress is the unit that this card is the originalDress of)
flavor: The dragon followers of the moon, becomes the blades that support the sprites.

name: Blaze Maiden, Riezel
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If you have a rear-guard with an originalDress, this unit gets [Power] +2000/[Shield] +5000.
flavor: That new look, somehow fits really well.

name: Heart-pounding Blaze Maiden, Rino
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Snuggling Blaze Maiden, Reiyu", search your deck for up to one "Trickstar", call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck. [CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have a ＜Prayer Dragon＞ unit in the same column as this unit, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: A new egg?! My name is Rino. Nice to meet you!

name: Surprise Egg
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: Inheriting the powers of the sun and the moon, the shining new hope.

name: Trickstar
effect: [CONT](RC):This unit cannot be chosen by your opponent's card effects.
flavor: Come come, what shall we play next?

name: Blaze War Monk, Sougyou
flavor: This greatsword cloaked in flames, cannot be seen through by mere amateurs!

name: Blaze Sense Monk, Hakumee
flavor: Earnestly striving after a goal is a given for any effort.

name: Blaze Maiden, Arush
flavor: Adding flames to the spins, bringing the dance to a new level of extreme.

name: Blaze Maiden, Reony
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck)
flavor: To drive back the tumult, and surround the battlefield with the timbre of healing.

name: Holy Flames That Binds
effect: Choose one of your units with "Nirvana" in its card name, and it gets [Power] +20000 until end of that battle.
flavor: The holy flame and the sealed blaze. The combined flames became an amazing force.

name: Phase Transition Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a card from your soul, put it into your drop, and until end of that battle, this unit's [Power] increases by the original [Shield] of the card put into your drop.
flavor: Twisting the time-space, and inverting it.

name: Diabolos Digger, Beigiel
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks while boosted, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: The job is not just about carrying balls around.

name: Diabolos Reverser, Diandre
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from your soul, if you have a vanguard with "Bruce" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn for every two cards in your damage zone.
flavor: Threading closely to the line makes it more exciting, right?

name: Desire Devil, Kodooku
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks while not boosted, if your vanguard is "Avaricious Demonic Dragon, Greedon", choose up to four normal units with "Desire Devil" in their card names from your drop, and if you chose one or more cards, return them to your deck and shuffle it. If you returned four cards, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: It's not like I'm lonely. Rather, its more fun when I'm alone!?

name: Diabolos Girls, Kristen
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from your soul, if you are in "Final Rush", [Soul-Charge 2] for every two cards in your damage zone.
flavor: Cheers fill the arena, every time the trigger is pulled by her.

name: Lively Breath Dragon
flavor: The resplendent flame that bursts forth. You have also become a captive of the circus.

name: Advanced Clock Dragon
flavor: The needles on the clock, nobody will notice if it is moved forward a little, right?

name: Steam Gunner, Ilushma
flavor: Put an end to it while I'm shooting here!

name: Direful Doll, Alexandra
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck)
flavor: Behold my special performance, one that never ends.

name: Galactic B-Hero, Wired Klosten
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Scout a card with “B-Hero” in its card name from hand to your Base], and draw a card. (Scouted cards are put face up into your Order Zone)[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When this unit is moved to another (RC) during your battle phase, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: He approaches in an instant. Not just physically, but emotionally too.

name: Galactic B-Hero, Architect Paseel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), search your deck for up to one Base card, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.[CONT](RC): During the battle this unit boosted a unit with “B-Hero” in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: When choosing to create a base, it’s a given that bigger is better!

name: Capable Helper
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose a card with “B-Hero” in its card name from your drop, and Scout it to your Base. (Scouted cards are put face up into your Order Zone)
flavor: The multipurpose patrols guides the citizens while scouting potential recruits!

name: Galactic B-Hero, Purely Agno
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: The untainted cry of the firstborn, warns of the great danger that is foreseen.

name: Star Agression Dragon
flavor: This is my roar. Towards destruction, towards you.

name: Aberrant Gleam Dragon
flavor: His dragon records it all. The knowledge from the abyss that no one has seen.

name: Transforming Heavy Machinery, Heavy Constalion
flavor: Things like barricades, are meaningless before him.

name: Alter Rate Sphere Dragon
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck)
flavor: While gazing upon the planet, the future of destruction is twisted free.

name: Galactic Base “A.E.G.I.S.”
effect: (After a set order is played, put it into your Order Zone)[AUTO]:When this card is put into your Order Zone, look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to three cards with “B-Hero” in its card name from among them and reveal them, put up to one card from among them into your hand, and Scout up to two cards from among them to your Base, and shuffle your deck.[ACT]Order Zone:[COST][[Rest] this card, and discard a card from hand], choose one of your Scouted cards with grade less than or equal to your vanguard, and call it to (RC).[AUTO]Order Zone:When your unit is attacked, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & [Rest] this card], choose one of your Scouted cards, and call it to (GC).
flavor:
To manage the power of heroes
overflowing with originality.
In preparation of the danger that approaches.

name: Quadra Cast Sorceress
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Sorceress" in its card name, look at the top two cards from your deck, put them on the top of your deck in any order, and [Soul-Charge 1].
flavor: Singing clearly into the skies, the four chants that reel in the future.

name: Divine Sister, Benie
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Sorceress" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], reveal the top card of your deck, and if it is a normal unit, put it into your hand. (Return it to its original spot if it isn't)
flavor: This happy premonition, let me change it into reality♪

name: Milchweis Schutzer
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if you have a vanguard with "Youth" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: The absolute law of the sky. To crush it, the skyfall knight stands.

name: Menacing Tiger
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from your hand during your turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and call this card to (RC) as [Rest].[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: If you value your life, take your chance to escape while it is still intimidating you.

name: Dianadigon Sorceress
effect: [CONT](GC):If you have a vanguard with "Sorceress" in its card name, this unit gets [Shield] +10000.
flavor: Evil beings that squirm in the darkness. They shall be banished with blessings from the crescent moon.

name: Daring Knight, Sauel
flavor: Let us be off, gloriously!

name: Operating Angel
flavor: Backup supplies are on the way. Survive until then.

name: Merciless Buffalo
flavor: Charge in mercilessly, and trample over everything.

name: Palpitation Angel
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck)
flavor: The droplets of life, be careful not to spill any more of it.

name: Guardian of the Verdant, Patriya
effect: [CONT](GC):If you have five or more units, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: Protecting the forest with a strong will, the gentle stone guardians.

name: Flutter Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your unit boosts a vanguard, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: The dancing petals in the sky delivers a brilliant melody.

name: Recorder Racoon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, if you have a vanguard with "Lianorn" in its card name, your opponent cannot intercept until end of that battle.
flavor: The lively timbre, catches on to you as to listen.

name: Dual Pressure Dragon
flavor: Push, push, push through.

name: Early Summer Breeze Maiden, Willow
flavor: The wind carries tomorrow on it.

name: Chrysis Bisection
flavor: Split, into two.

name: Rythimica Kiwi
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck)
flavor: Let's dance energetically to the rhythm♪Leave all the unhappy thoughts behind♪

name: Happy Dreaming Festa!
effect: If you have a vanguard with "Lianorn" in its card name, play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]!Look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to two grade 1 or less unit cards, call them to (RC), and shuffle your deck.
flavor: A dream-like, heart-pounding enjoyable time, let us make it together!

name: Sweets That Become an Evil Dream
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]!Draw a card, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck, or discard it.
flavor: I'm a gourmet, you know? I'll eat them all though.

name: Youthberk "Skyfall Arms"
effect: [RevolDress]－[AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, choose up to one card with "RevolForm" in its card name from your hand, ride it as [Stand], and it gets drive -2 until end of turn. [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Discard a card from hand], look at the top three cards of your deck, choose up to one card with "RevolForm" in its card name from among them and reveal it and put it into your hand, or choose up to one grade 2 or less card from among them and call it to (RC), and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Grand March of Full Bloom, Lianorn
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw a card, choose a card from your hand, and call it to (RC) or discard it.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & discard a card from hand], and boost this unit with all of your back row [Stand] units with "Boost". If you boosted this unit with three or more units, this unit gets drive +1 until end of that battle, and at the end of that battle, choose two of your back row rear-guards, and [Stand] them.

name: Chakrabarthi Phoenix Dragon, Nirvana Jheva
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Discard a card from hand], choose up to one "Trickstar" and up to one ＜Prayer Dragon＞ unit from your drop, and call them to (RC).[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your rear-guards in the XoverDress state, and [Stand] it.

name: Brilliant Equip, Bram Vairina
effect: X-overDress－One "Trickstar" and one ＜Prayer Dragon＞ unit [CONT](RC):During your turn, if this unit is in the XoverDress state, this unit gets [Power] +10000, and if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Power] +10000. [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, if this unit is in the X-overDress state, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your columns, and retire all of your opponent's units in that column.

name: Jeweled Sword Equip, Garou Vairina
effect: XoverDress－One "Trickstar" and one ＜Prayer Dragon＞ unit [CONT](RC):If this unit is in the XoverDress state, this unit gets [Power] +10000, and for the battle this unit attacked, when your opponent would call cards from their hand to (GC), they must call two or more at the same time.

name: Diabolos Diver, Julian
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn for each card in your damage zone. If you have a vanguard with "Bruce" in its card name, [Soul-Charge 1] for every two cards in your damage zone. Choose up to the same number of cards [Soul-Charge] by this effect from your soul, and call them to open (RC).

name: Merciless Count, Botis
effect: [AUTO](RC):When you [Soul-Blast 2] or more at the same time for the cost of your card’s ability, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. If you [Soul-Blast 3] or more at the same time, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a card from your drop, put it into your soul, choose up to one of your opponent's rear-guards with the same grade as that card, and retire it.

name: Direful Doll, Amandine
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if your soul has ten or more cards, this unit gets [Power] +10000. [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], and until end of turn, when you would [Soul-Charge] by your card's ability, increase that number by ①.

name: Galactic B-Hero, Unite Dianos
effect: [CONT](VC):All of your front row rear-guards with “B-Hero” in their card names get [Power] +5000. [AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, if your Order Zone has a Base, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and until end of that battle, this unit gets [Power] +15000, and if your Order Zone has three or more Bases, this unit gets [Critical]+1.

If you boosted this unit with three or more units, this unit gets drive +1 until end of that battle, and at the end of that battle, choose two of your back row rear-guards, and [Stand] them.
